inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Light Hammer', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Warhammer', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Maul', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Hammers
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with light hammers, warhammers, and mauls.
